name: ​ The Hero Code
description:
This little but brave game was developed to participate at Ludum Dere 43. It tells a simple story of a group of adventures, on a quest to save the world from evil. But this heroic deed requires not only determination but some sacrifice. Not every hero will come back home, and they will go by the hero code so that the world could be saved!

Use your mouse to perform actions and WASD keys to move and 1 2 3 keys to change formation (also spare some time to look and what game is saying to you).

We hope you will have a good time!

For Visual components, you see on the screen big thanks to 0x72 here is the link to his dungeon Tileset and wonderful characters with animations! (https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii)

Also for every sound in a game was downloaded from freesound.org kudos to all the authors on that platform as well.
